name: Brightening Cleanser
ingreients_grouping:
Purified Water, Decyl Glucoside (Veg. Oils & Sugar), Disodium Coco-Glucoside Citrate, Coco Glucoside Oleaste (Coconut and Sunflower Oil), Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein*, Xanthan Gum, Fragaria Chiloensis Seed Oil (Strawberry), Lycopene, Phenoxyethanol and Ethylhexylglycerin (both derived from natural sources). 
*Note: contains gluten.

name: CoQ-10 Toner
ingreients_grouping: Purified water (aqua), Aloe Barbadensis, Coenzyme Q10, Hyaluronic Acid, Anthemis Nobilis (Chamomile), Salvia Officinalis (Sage), Carica Papaya Leaf Extract, Cucums Sativus (Cucumber) Extract, Citrus Aurantium Flower Oil, Phenoxyethanol and Ethylhexylglycerin (both derived from natural sources)

name: Calendula Eye Balm
ingreients_grouping: Calendula Officinalis Flower (calendula) Oil, Beeswax, Magnifera Indica (mango) Seed Butter,  Lavandula Angustifolia (lavender) Oil, Squalane (olive derived), Persea gratissima (avocado) Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate (vitamin E)

name: Rosehip Cleanser
ingreients_grouping: Aqua, Sodium Olivate (Fatty Acid from Olive), Glycerin, Rosa Rubiginosa Seed Oil, Chondrus Crispus, Eriobotrya Japonica Extract

name: Squalane Facial Cream
ingreients_grouping: Aqua, Simmondsia Chinensis, Persea Gratissima, Aloe Barbadensis, Emulsifying Wax, Vegetable Glycerin, Elaeis Guineensis, Palm Stearic Acid, Squalane (olive derived), Hyaluronic Acid, Tocopheryl Acetate, Rosa Rubiginosa Seed Oil, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Dl-Panthenol, Allantoin, Xanthan Gum, Triticum Vulgare, Daucus Carota Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis Leaf Extract, Phenoxyethanol

name: Swiss Apple Facial Serum
ingreients_grouping: Seaweed Extract, Purified Water, Hyaluronic Acid, Malus Domestica Fruit Cell Culture, Xanthan Gum, Lecithin, Phenoxyethanol*, Ethylhexylglycerin*   *Derived from natural sources.

name: Blemish Lotion
ingreients_grouping: 100 Natural: Purified Water, Isopropyl Alcohol, Colloidal Sulfur, Zinc Oxide, Salicylic Acid, Magnesium, Aluminum Silicate (Clay), Camphor, Iron Oxide

name: Blemish Stick
ingreients_grouping: Isopropyl Alcohol, Purified Water, Zinc, Sulphate, Salicylic Acid, Glycolic Acid, Camphor, Witch Hazel, Cellulose Gum, Menthol

name: Clearing Mask
ingreients_grouping: Purified Water (aqua), Bentonite Clay, Zinc Oxide, Colloidal Sulfur, Salicylic Acid, Glycolic Acid, Hyaluronic Acid, Chondrus Crispus (seaweed) Extract, Anthemis Noblis (chamomile) extract, Camphor, Saccharide Isomerate, Phenoxyethanol and Ethylhexylglycerin both derived from natural sources

name: Hydrating Body Balm
ingreients_grouping: Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Beeswax, Melissa Officinalis (Lemon Balm) Leaf Extract, Essential Oils of Lavandula Angustifolia, Anthemis Nobilis (chamomile), Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot), Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E).

name: Lavender Chamomile Moisturizing Oil
ingreients_grouping: 100% Natural: Simmondsia Chinensis (jojoba) Oil, Prunus Armeniaca (apricot) Oil, Essential Oils of Lavandula Angustifolia (lavender) and Anthemis Nobilis (chamomile).

name: Vanilla Citrus Moisturizing Oil
ingreients_grouping: Simmondsia Chinensis (jojoba) Oil, Prunus Armeniaca (apricot) Oil, Vanilla Planifolia (vanilla), Citrus Aurantium Sinensis (sweet orange)

name: Patchouli Sandalwood Moisturizing Oil
ingreients_grouping: Simmondsia Chinensis (jojoba) Oil, Prunus Armeniaca (apricot) Oil, Essential Oils of Pogostemon Cablin (patchouli), Santalum Album (sandalwood),  and Cananga Odorata (ylang ylang)

name: Coconut Citrus Body Scrub
ingreients_grouping: Saccharum Officinarum (sugarcane), Coco Nucifera (coconut) Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (jojoba) Oil, Melissa Officinalis (lemon balm), Cymbopogon Citratus (lemongrass) and Vanilla Planifolia (vanilla).

name: Lemongrass Calendula Body Lotion
ingreients_grouping: Purified Water (aqua), Glycerine (from Coconut Oil), Stearic Acid (from Coconut Oil), Cetearyl Alcohol (from Palm Oil), Myristyl Myristate (fatty acid), Glycerol Monostearate, Glycine Joja (Soybean) Oil, Simmondsia Chinesis (Jojoba) Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Calendula Officinalis Flower (Calendula) Oil, Cymbopogon Citratus (Lemongrass) Oil, Phenoxyethanol and Ethylhexyglycerin both derived from natural sources

name: Lemongrass Citrus Body Wash
ingreients_grouping: Aqua, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate (from creatine or caffeine), Xanthan Gum (from glucose, lactose or sucrose), Panthanol (vitamine B5), Xylitol (fruit and vegetable), Oat Flour, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, Pure Essential Oil Blend, Biovert (from glucose and lactose)

name: Unscented Body Lotion
ingreients_grouping: Purified Water (aqua), Glycerine (from Coconut Oil), Stearic Acid (from Coconut Oil), Cetearyl Alcohol (from Palm Oil), Myristyl Myristate  (fatty acid), Glycerol Monostearate, Glycine Joja (Soybean) Oil, Simmondsia Chinesis (Jojoba) Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Calendula Officinalis Flower (Calendula) Oil, Phenoxyethanol and Ethylhexyglycerin both derived from natural sources
